All Implemented Interfaces:
org.apache.avalon.excalibur.pool.Poolable, org.apache.avalon.excalibur.pool.Recyclable, org.apache.avalon.framework.activity.Disposable, org.apache.avalon.framework.component.Component, org.apache.avalon.framework.logger.LogEnabled, org.apache.avalon.framework.service.Serviceable, org.apache.cocoon.generation.Generator, org.apache.cocoon.sitemap.SitemapModelComponent, org.apache.cocoon.xml.XMLProducer
public class FileManager
extends org.apache.cocoon.generation.ServiceableGenerator
implements org.apache.avalon.framework.activity.Disposable

Implements the collections structure in a unix directory and provides a way for the user to invoke Abbot. Allows creation of individual collections. Allows user to upload files, uncompress if necessary, convert the files using Abbot, and then download them. If necessary the user can compress the files before download. Requires abbot-0.3.3-standalone.jar

Version:
0.1, 2/15/2012
Author:
Frank Smutniak, Center for Digital Research in the Humanities, http://cdrh.unl.edu
